title: Hi we are looking for sponsorship for a reality TV series on NewZealand tv
body:
Hi we are looking for a sponsor to fund a reality TV Gold Mining series, i have been a long time player of the game i would post on my normal account, but i cant remember my password for that account, because about 11 months ago i was assaulted and put into a coma for 3 weeks, i have been in recovery mode ever since it. I have been learning to play again on this account trying to get better lol, loving bronze plays :), if you as a company would like more information or even League of legends OCE please email quantumgoldnz@gmail.com

"New Zealand Gold sponsored by League of legends OCE" would look pretty good on TV

replies.body: Why are you post that on here?
No one would watch a show about shitty jobs such as mining, that's fucking stupid.... wait, ice road truckers was a thing. You're allgood bruddah good luck
